name: TWO HARBORS INVESTMENT CORP.
footnote: The condensed consolidated balance sheets include assets of consolidated variable interest entities, or VIEs, that can only be used to settle obligations of these VIEs, and liabilities of the consolidated VIEs for which creditors do not have recourse to Two Harbors Investment Corp. At September 30, 2017 and December 31, 2016, assets of the VIEs totaled $3,094,462 and $3,336,292, and liabilities of the VIEs totaled $2,804,685 and $3,058,278, respectively.
